Package org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.validation.modules

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WorkflowValidationModule
    Interface for workflow validation module that check a single issue.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivtyValidationModule
    Checks for missing activity data (name, caption, ports)
    CycleDetectionValidationModule
    Checks for cycles in acyclic graph activities
    DatatypeMatchValidationModule
    Checks that data sources or forwarded data matches the data type of the target port.
    LabelMatchValidationModule
    Checks that data sources or forwarded data matches the label type of the target port.
    MissingChildActivitiesValidationModule
    Checks if there are any activities that should have a child activity but don't have one.
    MissingDatatypesValidationModule
    Checks whether all data ports have a data type specified.
    UnconnectedDataPortsValidationModule
    Checks for 'loose ends' (input ports that have no source or output ports that are not forwarded anywhere)
    WorkflowObjectValidationModule
    Workflow validation module that checks the main workflow object itself.
